page.title: 17Media
page.content: Nearly every house in the district has a television set.Licences can be obtained from the local post office.Local radio stations are Radio Clwyd and Marcher Sound,Wrexham.This recently merged with Radio City as Marcher Sound was losing money.Other radio stations are Radio Merseyside and Red Rose Radio as well as BBC Radio.The Sun is the most popular daily newspaper,then the Daily Mirror,the Daily Express and the Daily Mail.The Evening Leader is delivered every evening with a childrens page on Mondays.The chronicle is delivered every Friday and has a childrens club and much local news.The Deeside Advertiser is free.It is delivered to every house and contains much of local events,but mainly contains advertising .All papers and magazines can be obtaibed from the local newsagents.
